data.title: EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad confirmed â€“ Erling Haaland and Harry Kane headline impressive squad
data.meta_description: The EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad is now available in Ultimate Team, and EA has gone big after some impressive attacking performances
data.text:
EA FC 24 TOTW 7 has been revealed by EA Sports, with two 92-rated players included in a packed TOTW squad.

There were a host of big names in contention to feature in the EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad including Kylian Mbappe, as per our TOTW 7 predictions, but EA Sports has opted to include Erling Haaland and Harry Kane as this week's big hitters, with the duo rated 92 overall after fantastic performances. Lyon Women's Wendie Renard also features in the EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad with an 89-rated player item, but EA has turned the defender from fodder into one of the best defenders in the game, with the French international being blessed with a plus 17 pace upgrade.

Players from Arsenal, Fulham and PSV are also included in the EA FC 24 TOTW 7 reveal. The EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad is available in Ultimate Team from now until Wednesday, November 7 at 5.59pm GMT / 12.59pm EDT / 9.59am PDT.

EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad lineup

Haaland and Kane are the two highlights of the TOTW 7 squad, but Renard looks incredible after jumping into the 70s for pace while also boasting 92 defending, 85 physical and the Anticipate Plus PlayStyle. Arsenal's Eddie Nketiah is this week's Featured TOTW at 84 rated, but for the first time in EA FC 24, there is a second Featured TOTW player, Oscar De Marcos.

Here's the EA FC 24 TOTW 7 squad in full:

ST: Erling Haaland (Manchester City) - 92 OVR

ST: Harry Kane (Bayern Munich) - 92 OVR

CB: Wendie Renard (Lyon Women) - 89 OVR

LB: Katie McCabe (Arsenal Women) - 86 OVR

RB: Oscar De Marcos (Atletic Bilbao) - 85 OVR (Featured TOTW)

CDM: Joao Palhinha (Fulham) - 85 OVR

ST: Edin Dzeko (Fenerbahce) - 85 OVR

ST: Eddie Nketiah (Arsenal) - 84 OVR (Featured TOTW)

LW: Hirving Lozano (PSV) - 84 OVR

CAM: Isco (Real Betis) - 83 OVR

GK: Oliver Baumann (Hoffenheim) - 83 OVR

CB: Facundo Medina (Lens) - 83 OVR

CM: Georgino Wijnaldum (Al Ettifaq) - 83 OVR

CB: Alessandro Buongiomo (Torino) - 81 OVR

ST: Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) - 80 OVR

LM: Alvaro Barreal (Cincinatti FC) - 80 OVR

RW: Anders Dreyer (Anderlecht) - 80 OVR

RB: Mattia Zanotti (St. Gallen) - 80 OVR
